TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool TimeoutMailCallback(Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties properties, out SPWeb web, out StringDictionary headers, out string body);
.class public auto ansi sealed TimeoutMailCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function TimeoutMailCallback(taskId As Guid, properties As SPWorkflowTaskProperties, ByRef web As SPWeb, ByRef headers As StringDictionary, ByRef body As String) As Boolean

public delegate bool TimeoutMailCallback(Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties ^ properties, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] SPWeb ^ % web, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] StringDictionary ^ % headers, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % body);
type TimeoutMailCallback = delegate of Guid * SPWorkflowTaskProperties * * * -> bool

Docs.param: The GUID of the workflow task.
An SPWorkflowTaskProperties object that contains information about the workflow task.
An SPWeb object that is the container for the workflow task.
A StringDictionary object that contains the e-mail header information.
A string that contains the body of the e-mail message.
Docs.summary: Called to generate the task e-mail body when the time allotted for the task has expired.
Docs.returns: A Boolean value that indicates that the e-mail was generated and sent.
